org.apache.hama.bsp.sync

Interface SyncClient

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MasterSyncClient, PeerSyncClient
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BSPMasterSyncClient, BSPPeerSyncClient, LocalBSPRunner.LocalSyncClient, ZKSyncBSPMasterClient, ZKSyncClient, ZooKeeperSyncClientImpl

    public interface SyncClient
    Basic interface for a client that connects to a sync server.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • constructKey

        String constructKey(BSPJobID jobId,
                  String... args)
        Construct key in the format required by the SyncClient for storing and retrieving information. This function is recommended to use to construct keys for storing keys.
        Parameters:
        jobId - The BSP Job Id.
        args - The list of String objects that would be used to construct key
        Returns:
        The key consisting of entities provided in the required format.

      • storeInformation

        boolean storeInformation(String key,
                       org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable value,
                       boolean permanent,
                       SyncEventListener listener)
        Stores value for the specified key.
        Parameters:
        key - The key for which value should be stored. It is recommended to use constructKey to create key object.
        value - The value to be stored.
        permanent - true if the value should be persisted after end of session.
        listener - object that provides asynchronous updates on the state of information stored under the key.
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful.

      • getInformation

        boolean getInformation(String key,
                     org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable valueHolder)
        Retrieve value previously store for the key.
        Parameters:
        key - The key for which value was stored.
        valueHolder - The expected class instance of value to be extracted
        Returns:
        the value if found. Returns null if there was any error of if there was no value stored for the key.

      • addKey

        boolean addKey(String key,
             boolean permanent,
             SyncEventListener listener)
        Store new key in key set.
        Parameters:
        key - The key to be saved in key set. It is recommended to use constructKey to create key object.
        permanent - true if the value should be persisted after end of session.
        listener - Listener object that asynchronously notifies the events related to the key.
        Returns:
        true if operation was successful.

      • hasKey

        boolean hasKey(String key)
        Check if key was previously stored.
        Parameters:
        key - The value of the key.
        Returns:
        true if the key exists.

      • getChildKeySet

        String[] getChildKeySet(String key,
                      SyncEventListener listener)
        Get list of child keys stored under the key provided.
        Parameters:
        key - The key whose child key set are to be found.
        listener - Listener object that asynchronously notifies the changes under the provided key
        Returns:
        Array of child keys.

      • registerListener

        boolean registerListener(String key,
                       SyncEvent event,
                       SyncEventListener listener)
        Register a listener for events on the key.
        Parameters:
        key - The key on which an event listener should be registered.
        event - for which the listener is registered for.
        listener - The event listener that defines how to process the event.
        Returns:
        true if the operation is successful.

      • remove

        boolean remove(String key,
             SyncEventListener listener)
        Delete the key and the information stored under it.
        Parameters:
        key -
        listener -
        Returns:
        true if the operation is successful.

      • close

        void close()
           throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException
